title.narrative: The SNE has supported the work on human rights issues of the EUDEL in Egypt

description.narrative: 1. Maintained and enhanced regular communication with the Human Rights network in Egypt (civil society organizations, trade unions, NGOs, youth etc.) serving as a contact point for that network. 2. Prepared regular reports to headquarters reflecting developments in the Human Rights situation in Egypt. 3. Assisted the head of the Political section in the preparation of Human Rights strategies for Egypt. 4. Prepared and coordinated the informal EU presidency group on Human Rights. 5. Liaised with like-minded groups in Egypt. 6. Coordinated with other relevant international actors, notably UNDP, League of Arab States, IOM etc. 7. Contributed to enhancing dialogue with the Egyptian Ministry of Foreign Affairs department for Human Rights and the People’s Assembly committee for Human Rights. 8. Contributed to the design and implementation of actions on Human Rights related issues within the EU Delegation, liaising closely with the operations section. 9. Contributed to the development of the European Neighborhood Program report and monitor development of the Union of the Mediterranean in relation with Human Rights.
